mapper.select: select * from THUMBUP where member_num = #{member_num} and e_book_num = #{e_book_num}
mapper.update: update E_BOOK set e_book_thumbupcnt = e_book_thumbupcnt+1 where e_book_num = #{e_book_num};
mapper.insert: insert ignore into THUMBUP(thumbup_num, member_num, e_book_num, thumbup_date) values ((select max(t.thumbup_num)+1 from THUMBUP t), #{member_num}, #{e_book_num}, CURDATE())
mapper.update: update E_BOOK set e_book_thumbupcnt = e_book_thumbupcnt-1 where e_book_num = #{e_book_num};
mapper.delete: delete from THUMBUP where member_num = #{member_num} and e_book_num = #{e_book_num}
